testcase.name: Add Potato three kgs
testcase.system-out: Given user types "Potato" into text box "Search for Vegetables and Fruits"..passed When user click on "+"......................................................passed And user click on "ADD TO CART".............................................passed And user clears text in search..............................................passed And user types "Strawberry" into text box "Search for Vegetables and Fruits".passed And user clears textbox "Search for Vegetables and Fruits"..................passed Then user click on "bag" icon...............................................passed And user click on "PROCEED TO CHECKOUT".....................................passed And user types "Apply" into text box "Enter promo code".....................passed And user clears textbox "Enter promo code"..................................passed And user click on "Apply"...................................................passed And user click on "Place Order".............................................passed And user click on "Select"..................................................passed And user click on "India"...................................................passed And user checks "checkbox"..................................................passed And user click on "Proceed".................................................passed
